title: Sweet potato, carrot and red lentil soup
ingredients: ['1 knob salted butter', '1 leek, chopped', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon mild chilli powder', '2 tablespoons mild curry powder, divided', '2 medium sized sweet potatoes, peeled and grated', '1 large carrot, grated', '1.5L water', '1 chicken stock cube', '1 vegetable stock cube', '2 teaspoons garlic powder', '250g red lentils', '1 clove garlic, grated', 'salt and pepper to taste']
